name: 鄭光炎
objective:
隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.
